Subject:
INITIATION OF
CONSTRUCTION
WOR
K
ON
SURAZAI PROJECT
/ PAYMENT SCHEDULE
PHA Foundation is pleased to inform you that construction work on grey structure housing units have been initiated and contractors have mobilized on site. It is further informed that the construction work in phase-I initiated only on those houses whose
allottees
did not take refund of their deposited payment and shown trust on PHAF.
2.

allottees
that the
construction of grey structures for 885 houses divided into eight packages have
been initiated on site along with mobilization of the contractor
(For latest
pics
& videos visit www.pha.gov.pk)
